description: Some Electronic Arts video games released in the late 2000s and early 2010s use the RenderWare 4 graphics engine to load and show graphics to players. 3D models used by the RenderWare 4 graphics engine are saved as RW4 files.
Most prominently, Spore and SimCity (2013) use the RenderWare 4 graphics engine. Modders of these games have created tools that allow them to open and examine RW4 files' contents.
